Music Guide

  • Key: E Major (E)
  • Tempo: 105 BPM (Beats Per Minute)
  • Main Chords: E, A, B
  • Structure: Verse - Chorus - Verse - Chorus - Bridge - Chorus - Outro

About the Song

Released in 1980, "9 to 5" is an iconic anthem written and performed by Dolly Parton for the comedy film of the same name. The song masterfully blends an upbeat, catchy country-pop melody with lyrics that voice the frustrations and aspirations of office workers, particularly women, facing inequality and drudgery in the workplace. It became a massive international hit and a rallying cry for workers everywhere, solidifying its place in pop culture history.
